feed.title: HeyForm Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for HeyForm: v0.0.14
entry.content:
Improvement

  • Fix the issue that HTTP 500 when submitting a form with "Question group" containing a "File upload" #138
  • Fix the issue that clicking Next Page in Submissions does not advance to a new page for >30 submissions #129
  • Fix the issue that address question type crashes #140

https://github.com/heyform/heyform/compare/v0.0.13...v0.0.14

entry.title: New release for HeyForm: v0.0.15
entry.content:
Improvement

  • Fix saving first hidden_field by @SiebelsTim in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/150

New Contributors

  • @SiebelsTim made their first contribution in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/150

Full Changelog: https://github.com/heyform/heyform/compare/v0.0.14...v0.0.15

entry.title: New release for HeyForm: v0.0.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add Turkish language translation and support by @hsndmr in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/153
  • Update name localization for signup by @hsndmr in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/156
  • Add TLS ServerName option by @Nimon77 in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/158
  • Add Spanish translation by @1024mb in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/169
  • Add Portuguese Brazilian Translation by @louanfontenele in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/173

New Contributors

  • @hsndmr made their first contribution in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/153
  • @Nimon77 made their first contribution in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/158
  • @1024mb made their first contribution in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/169
  • @louanfontenele made their first contribution in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/173

Full Changelog: https://github.com/heyform/heyform/compare/v0.0.15...v0.0.16

entry.title: New release for HeyForm: v0.0.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix pnpm@10 blocks lifecycle scripts issue (https://github.com/pnpm/pnpm/issues/9032)
  • Fix icon of Deploy On Alibaba Cloud by @wenle in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/177
  • Add Czech Translation by @pavelstianko in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/179

New Contributors

  • @wenle made their first contribution in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/177
  • @pavelstianko made their first contribution in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/179

Full Changelog: https://github.com/heyform/heyform/compare/v0.0.16...v0.0.17

entry.title: New release for HeyForm: v0.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixed no space in question titles by @iNSaNiA0821 in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/182
  • Removed the tag name in the question title by @iNSaNiA0821 in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/183

New Contributors

  • @iNSaNiA0821 made their first contribution in https://github.com/heyform/heyform/pull/182

Full Changelog: https://github.com/heyform/heyform/compare/v0.0.17...v0.1.0
